title: BSTA 511/611 Fall 2024
text:
Welcome to BSTA 511/611!


Estimation and Hypothesis Testing
Applied Biostatistics I

Fall 2024






Instructor
 Meike Niederhausen, PhD
 VPT 660E
 niederha@ohsu.edu


Course details
 Mon, Wed
 9/30 - 12/11
 1:00 - 2:50 PM
 VPT 620M


Office Hours
 Wednesdays 2:50-3:50 pm
 In classroom
 Fridays 3:30-4:30 pm
  Webex (link on Sakai)







Contacting me
E-mail or Slack is the best way to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all course-related e-mails within 24 hours Monday-Friday.


 View the source on GitHub

title: Schedule

Dates
Topics

2

Day 2: Intro to Data, Data collection, Summarizing numerical data

Day 3: Data visualization, exploratory data analysis (EDA), and summarizing categorical data
1.5-1.7 & supplementary

4.1



W 10/30
Exam 1: Days 1-6

4.2

7
M 11/11
Day 11: Hypothesis Testing: Two-sample independent data; Power

W 11/13

8
